description: karlandrefilms is a student-led initiative at the intersection of digital filmmaking, photography, and artificial intelligence. The project uses open-source tools to explore new forms of creative storytelling while contributing insights and reproducible workflows to the broader community. The goal is to enable accessible, AI-powered multimedia production and to promote experimentation and safety through transparent research and shared tools.

needs.description: A high-performance workstation for running local AI models (e.g., Whisper, Ollama, Stable Diffusion) and automating creative workflows including video editing and transcription.
Licenses and cloud-based resources to support experiment tracking, data storage, and creative pipeline development.
Independent technical research into transparency, model behavior, and reproducibility in open-source generative AI applications.
